fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives: Application to be a member organization of the high-level expert group on Artificial Intelligence
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: High-level expert group on Artificial Intelligence
goals__remit:
ICON has the following objectives: 
•    Contribute to the thinking, to research, to development, to the promotion and integration in daily and professional life of people, institutions and businesses, especially in the areas of ICT with a focus on intelligence artificial and cyber security. 
•    Support the reflection of international organizations, businesses, Governments and the civil society around ICT topics whose mastery of information, data protection, cybersecurity and artificial intelligence. 
•    Help all those who collaborate with the association ICON to adapt to the various digital developments, esp. the younger generations. 
•    Gather and lead a community of independent experts on these topics. 
•    Provide advisory bodies to international organizations. 
•    Provide coaching, training and seminars in Switzerland and abroad, and all activities related to its purpose or to develop it.
